item.title: Projects
item.description: One of the areas I focus on as a red teamer is the building and optimization of capabilities through development and infrastructure automation (or really anything under Tactic TA0042 for fellow MITRE ATT&CK©️ wonks).

item.title: Exploring VS Code's Global State
item.description: While working on the Venus payload for Mythic C2, which is a cross-platform implant that installs as a Visual Studio Code extension, I needed a way to record that the malware checked in with the C2 server.
